inlineContent.text: Understand the core concepts of the PDFKit framework and
the basic architecture for building a PDF reader app.
Import PDFKit into your project.
You can use it directly without any CocoaPods or SPM dependencies.
Explore the main class hierarchy of PDFKit.
PDFKit is a PDF processing framework provided by Apple that allows
you to display and manipulate PDF documents on macOS and iOS.
Cross-platform
: Supports iOS, macOS, Mac Catalyst
Full-featured
: Supports rendering, search, annotations, and editing
UIKit/SwiftUI integration
: Easy UI integration
This is the most basic way to load a PDF document from the Bundle.
Access the basic properties of the document.
You can check page count, encryption status, metadata, and more.
Encrypted PDFs require unlocking.
Handle this with the
method.
PDFDocument is the in-memory representation of a PDF file.
It contains information such as document metadata, page list, and encryption status.
PDFDocument can be created from a file URL, Data, or CGPDFDocument.
PDFPage represents an individual page of a document.
Each page has its own size, rotation, and list of annotations.
You can extract text from a page or render it as an image.
Access a specific page by index.
The index starts from 0.
Check the page’s size and rotation information.
PDF pages have several “box” types: mediaBox, cropBox, bleedBox, etc.
Extract the text content of a page.
Use the
property for plain text, and
for formatted text.
PDFDocument is the in-memory representation of a PDF file.
A different class handles screen display.
PDFDocument
PDFView is the view that renders PDFs on screen
and handles user interaction.
PDFView
PDFPage represents an individual page of a document
and is not displayed directly on screen.
PDFPage
Which of the main PDFKit classes is responsible for displaying PDFs on screen?
Check the exact method name used for password unlocking
in PDFDocument.
decrypt(password:)
unlock(withPassword:) unlocks an encrypted PDF
and returns true/false.
unlock(withPassword:)
PDF loading and password unlocking are separate operations.
You call unlock on an already loaded document.
open(password:)
Which method is used to open an encrypted PDF document?
mediaBox
mediaBox is the total physical size of the page.
The area that gets clipped during printing is a different box type.
cropBox defines the area to be displayed on screen or printed.
This is the reference box in most cases.
cropBox
artBox
artBox represents the meaningful content area
and is different from the print reference box.
Which box type in PDFPage is used as the reference for the print area?

to provide an optimal PDF reading experience.
